sakai:title: Contacts - Ignored.
sakai:shortDescription: Get all the current user's ignored contacts.
sakai:description: This search will get all the ignored contacts in the current user's contactstore.
sakai:response:
Standard request.
Example: Request to: /_user/contacts/ignored.json
{
   "query": "//_user/contacts/_x0037_9/_x0039_4/ea/_x0034_6/simong//*[@sling:resourceType="sakai/contact" and @sakai:state!="IGNORED"]",
   "items": 25,
   "total": 0,
   "results": []}
